link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd

var:parameter.name: dimMember1
var:parameter.select: for $item in /*:xbrl/*:context[exists(.//*:typedMember[resolve-QName(@dimension,.) eq xs:QName('in-rbi-rep:CurrencyAxis')]) and exists(.//*:typedMember[resolve-QName(@dimension,.) eq xs:QName('rbi-core:NameOfTheLargeValuePaymentSystemAxis')]) and exists(.//*:typedMember[resolve-QName(@dimension,.) eq xs:QName('rbi-core:NameOfTheCorrespondentBankAxis')]) and exists(.//*:explicitMember[resolve-QName(./data(),.) eq xs:QName('in-rbi-rep:StandaloneMember')])] group by $d:= $item//*:NameOfTheLargeValuePaymentSystemDomain, $n:= $item//*:CurrencyDomain , $o:= $item//*:NameOfTheCorrespondentBankDomain return <axis ><rbi-par:NameOfTheLargeValuePaymentSystemDomain xmlns:rbi-par='http://www.rbi.org/in/xbrl/rbi-par'>{$d}</rbi-par:NameOfTheLargeValuePaymentSystemDomain><in-rbi-rep-par:CurrencyDomain xmlns:in-rbi-rep-par='http://www.rbi.org/in-rbi-rep-par'>{$n}</in-rbi-rep-par:CurrencyDomain><rbi-par:NameOfTheCorrespondentBankDomain xmlns:rbi-par='http://www.rbi.org/in/xbrl/rbi-par'>{$o}</rbi-par:NameOfTheCorrespondentBankDomain></axis>

var:parameter.name: dimMember2
var:parameter.select: for $item in /*:xbrl/*:context[exists(.//*:typedMember[resolve-QName(@dimension,.) eq xs:QName('in-rbi-rep:CurrencyAxis')]) and exists(.//*:typedMember[resolve-QName(@dimension,.) eq xs:QName('rbi-core:NameOfTheLargeValuePaymentSystemAxis')]) and exists(.//*:typedMember[resolve-QName(@dimension,.) eq xs:QName('rbi-core:NameOfTheCorrespondentBankAxis')]) and exists(.//*:explicitMember[resolve-QName(./data(),.) eq xs:QName('in-rbi-rep:ConsolidatedMember')])] group by $d:= $item//*:NameOfTheLargeValuePaymentSystemDomain, $n:= $item//*:CurrencyDomain , $o:= $item//*:NameOfTheCorrespondentBankDomain return <axis ><rbi-par:NameOfTheLargeValuePaymentSystemDomain xmlns:rbi-par='http://www.rbi.org/in/xbrl/rbi-par'>{$d}</rbi-par:NameOfTheLargeValuePaymentSystemDomain><in-rbi-rep-par:CurrencyDomain xmlns:in-rbi-rep-par='http://www.rbi.org/in-rbi-rep-par'>{$n}</in-rbi-rep-par:CurrencyDomain><rbi-par:NameOfTheCorrespondentBankDomain xmlns:rbi-par='http://www.rbi.org/in/xbrl/rbi-par'>{$o}</rbi-par:NameOfTheCorrespondentBankDomain></axis>

var:parameter.select: for $item in /*:xbrl/*:context[exists(.//*:typedMember[resolve-QName(@dimension,.) eq xs:QName('in-rbi-rep:CurrencyAxis')]) and exists(.//*:typedMember[resolve-QName(@dimension,.) eq xs:QName('rbi-core:NameOfTheLargeValuePaymentSystemAxis')]) and exists(.//*:explicitMember[resolve-QName(./data(),.) eq xs:QName('in-rbi-rep:StandaloneMember')])] group by $d:= $item//*:NameOfTheLargeValuePaymentSystemDomain, $n:= $item//*:CurrencyDomain return <axis ><rbi-par:NameOfTheLargeValuePaymentSystemDomain xmlns:rbi-par='http://www.rbi.org/in/xbrl/rbi-par'>{$d}</rbi-par:NameOfTheLargeValuePaymentSystemDomain><in-rbi-rep-par:CurrencyDomain xmlns:in-rbi-rep-par='http://www.rbi.org/in-rbi-rep-par'>{$n}</in-rbi-rep-par:CurrencyDomain></axis>
